meanings.definition: A person who cuts down trees for a living.
meanings.sent1: The lumberjacks worked hard in the forest.
meanings.sent2: We hired a team of lumberjacks to clear the land.
meanings.sent3: The lumberjacks told jokes while taking down the trees.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the lumberjacks' axes echoed through the woods.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lumberjacks chopping trees stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: The group of workers who cut down trees for a living.
meanings.sent1: A team of lumberjacks arrived to harvest the timber.
meanings.sent2: The lumberjacks gathered around the fallen tree to begin their work.
meanings.sent3: The lumberjacks celebrated a successful day of tree cutting.
meanings.sent4: The lumberjacks moved swiftly through the forest like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The community relied on the lumberjacks for their wood supply.
